title: Introduction to the KDD07 Conference
segmentation: Dear guests
My name is Harold Gordon.
And I have a privilege today.
The official open.
Our annual knowledge discovering data mining conference to which I serve as the general chair.
Welcome and thank you for coming.
I want to reflect.
The state of our data mining community is good that we are growing.
And somebody will see here random forest of Unpruned trees is in reality an error or Giants.
So this year we had 500 Gentilly Research paper submissions, 60 industrial and government tracker papers submitted.
We had wonderful workshops, tutorials, and most importantly we had 824 registers attendees and this makes us the largest conference over the two last years and was ever in data mining.
We also have.
Very distinguished invited Speakers John Flamebird from Carnell.
Osama fired from Yahoo and Chris Anderson from Wired magazine.
People don't know their fate.
And This is why in past times, astronomers.
You're making their living by practicing astrology because the demand for predictive modeling of faith was larger than demand in astronomy.
We are very fortunate in data mining.
Win this, they hurt them in data mining.
Scientists make decent living by practicing data mining.
And from this standpoint, is this very significant that the conference take place in San Jose?
A capital of Bay Area and Silicon Valley which is powerhouse in technology and intellectual development in the world.
It holds many universities, including two venerable schools.
UC Berkeley and Stanford University.
And many technological leaders such as Intel.
Cisco Applied Materials.
Sun Microsystems airport.
And many many many others.
I'll give you one statistic.
Our platinum sponsor.
Microsoft has a large campus in Silicon Valley and of three.
Gold level supporters of KD this year.
All three Oracle, Yahoo and Google allocated here in 15 minutes drive from one another.
This especially provides a rare opportunity for students who are looking for jobs to do some networking here.

I miss myself planned to talk to people who want to select data mining and research in industry as their career compasion and then other people from Yahoo and other companies who have waited to talk to them.
Also, San Jose is in close proximity of great recreational facilities.
We are in a one year drive from San Francisco cultural and Financial Center Pacific from wonderful beautiful coastal cities from many parks, wineries, museums and.
Today there is a Jazz Festival right outside of our portal.
I want to thank.
Our formal sponsor Association for computing machinery.
And all our supporters.
Exhibit is large and small, and those organizations who contributed to this conference thank you very much.
I also was privileged.
To work with a wonderful team of organizers who spent months in preparing this conference.
Would this gym be incorporated in a small startup?
Repair will have its own preparation is marketing is research and development and actually this idea is under discussion.
I want to thank them all in particular program.
Comedian led by Rich Caruana and Chinden Woo.
I also want to say that there is a small but robust army of student volunteers who help us.
Who led by our local chairs depends through Janna, who spent recently 24 hours 3 days in a row making this to happen.
And I want to special thank Gregory who actually served as my.
Co chair in all the issues and key.
Advise me on all the intrinsics of this business.
So thank you all.
Please stop in hallway and express your thanks for the organizers, then leaves our official papers and our official website.
But there is also people who are not here in particular person who organized organizers and assisted me a lot in all the contract negotiations and a lot of.
You know business elements of this venture.
Jungle fever.
John, thank you very much.
You probably know that data miners when they come with research proposals and consultant agreements are not shy and asking for resources.
So there was a little business intelligence operation run by Johnson Becker and who helped us to stay in the budget and we actually stayed in the budget.
So this is a big achievement now finally.
I want to say that we have a little problem with UPS.
We're trying to track our procedures and we will make an announcement as soon as we find them.
So you can pick it up during the conference.
Maybe tomorrow, maybe confused him.
I'm sorry for this inconvenience.
And again, thank you very much for coming.
Welcome to this conference and let's get to our business.
With this I want to present our program shares shut down and Rich Caruana.
